api_list.name: Get user id from username
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram174.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/user/instagram/id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram174.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram174.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/user/{username}/id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram174.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get media info

api_list.name: Get media id from data
api_list.description: Get the id of a media from some data like a link.

import requests

url = "https://instagram174.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/media/https://www.instagram.com/p/CZ7Ma5sNdif//id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram174.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
